articles.description: Manchester City captain Kyle Walker completes a loan move to Italian club AC Milan.
articles.title: Kyle Walker: AC Milan complete loan deal for Man City captain

articles.description: Aryna Sabalenka aims to become the first woman in 26 years to win three successive Australian Open titles when she meets Madison Keys in Saturday's final.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025: Aryna Sabalenka aims for third straight title in final against Madison Keys

articles.description: Manchester United winger Antony arrived in the summer of 2022 full of promise but he is now on the brink of leaving the club as one of their worst ever signings.
articles.title: Antony: Manchester United's £81m man set for fresh start

articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola says teams are prepared to take his side on in a manner they did not previously.
articles.title: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola says opponents no longer scared of his side

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats as Sheffield United take on Hull City in the Championship.
articles.title: EFL LIVE: Sheffield United vs Hull City - score & text commentary

articles.description: Novak Djokovic says he will return to the Australian Open next year if he is "fit, healthy and motivated" after retiring from his semi-final with injury.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025: Novak Djokovic unsure on Melbourne return after retiring injured from semi-final

articles.description: Defending champion Jannik Sinner will face Alexander Zverev in the Australian Open final after beating Ben Shelton in Melbourne.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Jannik Sinner beats Ben Shelton to set up Alexander Zverev final

articles.description: With Bournemouth challenging for a top-four place in the Premier League this season, BBC Sport analyses how the Cherries are doing it.
articles.title: Bournemouth under Iraola: Why have the Cherries been so good this season?

articles.description: Nikola Jokic hits a 66ft three-pointer as the Denver Nuggets beat the Sacramento Kings 132-123.
articles.title: NBA: Nikola Jokic hits 66ft three-pointer for Denver v Sacramento

articles.description: The Kansas City Chiefs will aim to reach a third straight Super Bowl in this weekend's Conference Championships, although the Philadelphia Eagles are favourites to be this season's NFL champions.
articles.title: NFL play-offs: Josh Allen and Patrick Mahomes renew rivalry as Kansas City Chiefs chase 'three-peat'
